actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To express my deep appreciation and gratitude to my current and former staff members for their loyalty, support and dedication to the Congress and the residents of the 20th and 22nd Congressional Districts of Pennsylvania during my 18 years as a member of the United States House of Representatives.

summary.text: Expresses appreciation to specified current and former staff members for their dedication to the Congress and to the residents of the 20th and 22nd congressional districts of Pennsylvania.

titles.title: To express my deep appreciation and gratitude to my current and former staff members for their loyalty, support and dedication to the Congress and the residents of the 20th and 22nd Congressional Districts of Pennsylvania during my 18 years as a member of the United States House of Representatives.
